notes: Function calls (weather and math) in non-streaming mode
requestBody: {"model":"gpt-5-nano","tools":[{"name":"get_weather","description":"Get current weather for a location","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"location":{"type":"string","description":"The city and country, e.g. 'Tokyo, Japan'"}},"required":["location"]},"type":"function"},{"name":"calculate_math","description":"Perform mathematical calculations","parameters":{"required":["expression"],"type":"object","properties":{"expression":{"type":"string","description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate"}}},"type":"function"}],"input":[{"content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with access to weather data and calculation capabilities.","type":"input_text"}],"role":"system"},{"content":[{"text":"What's the weather in Tokyo?
